application.name: csv2table
application.brief: Convert a CSV file to a table and attach it to a cube
application.description: The first row of the CSV will be used as the fieldnames for the table. Currently the table will be made of doubles

parameter.name: csv
parameter.description: Input CSV filename. The first row of this file will be used as the table field names.

parameter.name: to
parameter.description: Output cube filename that the table will be attached to

parameter.name: tablename
parameter.description: A table will be created with this name on the output cube using the data from the CSV file. If a table with this name already exists on the cube it will be overwritten.
